p: To evaluate the climatic suitability of potato, 43 agricultural meteorological stations were selected in the study area based on the unique geographical and climatic characteristics of northern China ( Fig 2). The selection principles were as follows: (1) the selected station was located in the potato-producing area of northern China; (2) several stations selected in each province represented the local climate and the geography; (3) each representative station had geographical and climatic differences and relative independence from one another.
